Rule: SEGMENT_ID : unique identifier, 12 digits, fixed format, combination of product type, age, original LTV, original credit score, geography, delinquency status
Age : 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, 06, categorical, fixed values, time elapsed since loan origination
Original LTV : 01, 02, 03, 04, categorical, fixed values, loan to value ratio at origination
Original credit score : 00, 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, categorical, fixed values, credit score of borrower at origination
Geography : 01, 02, 03, 04, 05, categorical, fixed values, primary borrower's current place of residence
Region : fixed values (Vermont, New Hampshire, Nebraska, South Dakota, North Dakota), categorical
Delinquency status : fixed values (01 - Current + 1-29 DPD, 02 - 30-59 DPD, 03 - 60-89 DPD, 04 - 90-119 DPD, 05 - 120+ DPD), categorical
Ever 30DPD in the last 12 months : numeric, greater than or equal to 0, past due amount
Ever 60DPD in the last 12 months : numeric, greater than or equal to 0, past due amount
Projected value : numeric, greater than or equal to 0, applicable only for leased vehicles
Actual sale proceeds : numeric, greater than or equal to 0, applicable only for leased vehicles
Original term : categorical, values = '<= 48 months', '49-60 months', '61-72 months', '> 72 months'
Loss mitigation : numeric, greater than or equal to 0, loss mitigation program status
Joint application : numeric, greater than or equal to 0, co-applicant status
Probability of Default (PD) : numeric, between 0 and 1, average probability of default
Loss Given Default (LGD) : numeric, between 0 and 1, average loss given default
ELGD : numeric, non-negative, decimal values with maximum 1, example 0.9 for 90%
RWA : numeric, non-negative, aggregate dollar value, applicable to advanced approaches banks
$ Unpaid Principal Balance at Charge-off : numeric, non-negative, total unpaid principal balance
Percent Loss Severity (3 month Lagged) : numeric, non-negative, percentage value, calculated as total loss net of recoveries
Weighted Average Life of Loans : numeric, non-negative, time to principal repayment in months, rounded to nearest monthly term
